theWeaponMaster:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theWeaponMaster:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theWeaponMaster:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theWeaponMaster:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theWeaponMaster:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theWeaponMaster:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theWeaponMaster:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theWeaponMaster:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.NAME: Special Strike
theWeaponMaster:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theWeaponMaster:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theWeaponMaster:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theWeaponMaster:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and 4 poison to an enemy.

theWeaponMaster:LW_Cerberus.NAME: Cerberus
theWeaponMaster:LW_Cerberus.DESCRIPTION: not_implemented NL Equip the Weapon Master's first sword and gain its corresponding cards.

theWeaponMaster:CerberusSlash.NAME: [#fcc72d]Slash
theWeaponMaster:CerberusSlash.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL not_implemented - Deal !D! plus !M! bonus damage for every card you discard.
theWeaponMaster:CerberusSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL not_implemented - Deal !D! plus !M! bonus damage for every card you discard.

theWeaponMaster:CerberusIaiSlash.NAME: [#fcc72d]Iai [#fcc72d]Slash
theWeaponMaster:CerberusIaiSlash.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL not_implemented - Deal !D! plus 2 bonus damage for every buff an enemy has.

theWeaponMaster:LW_Fenrir.NAME: Fenrir
theWeaponMaster:LW_Fenrir.DESCRIPTION: not_implemented NL Equip the evolving Fenrir and gain its corresponding cards.

theWeaponMaster:FenrirLacerate.NAME: Lacerate
theWeaponMaster:FenrirLacerate.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Take !M! damage to deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Lacerate. NL Evolve - Hit enemies with 3+ Lacerate.
theWeaponMaster:FenrirLacerate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Take !M! damage and deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Lacerate. Deal 20% bonus damage to enemies with Lacerate. NL Evolve - Hit enemies with 3+ Lacerate.

theWeaponMaster:FenrirShieldEater.NAME: Shield Eater
theWeaponMaster:FenrirShieldEater.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Take !M! damage to deal !D! damage and absorb an equal amount of block. NL Evolve - Destroy enemy Block.
theWeaponMaster:FenrirShieldEater.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Take !M! damage and deal  !D! damage and absorb an equal amount of block. Enemies lose health equal to 25% blocked damage. NL Evolve - Destroy enemy Block.

theWeaponMaster:FenrirIgnite.NAME: Ignite
theWeaponMaster:FenrirIgnite.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Take !M! damage to gain Block equal to triple the number of Fenrir upgrades (including from this use). NL Evolve - All enemies intend to attack you.
theWeaponMaster:FenrirIgnite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Take !M! damage to gain Block equal to 4 times the number of Fenrir upgrades (including from this use). NL Evolve - All enemies intend to attack.

theWeaponMaster:FenrirViciousSwing.NAME: Vicious Swing
theWeaponMaster:FenrirViciousSwing.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Take !M! damage to deal !D! damage. NL Evolve - Play holding 3 or fewer cards.
theWeaponMaster:FenrirViciousSwing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Take !M! damage to deal !D! damage. Vicious. NL Evolve - Play holding 3 or fewer cards.

theWeaponMaster:FenrirUnleashed.NAME: Fenrir Unleashed
theWeaponMaster:FenrirUnleashed.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Take !M! damage to deal !D! damage to all enemies, one after another. Overkill. NL Evolve - Kill an opponent.
theWeaponMaster:FenrirUnleashed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Take !M! damage to deal !D! damage to all enemies, one after another. Improved overkill. NL Evolve - Kill an opponent.

theWeaponMaster:LeviathanCrush.NAME: [#808080]Crush
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanCrush.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Armor_Break NL Hit the enemy for !D! damage. NL Take quarter damage if they don't block.
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanCrush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Armor_Break, Crush NL Hit the enemy for !D! damage. NL Take quarter damage if they don't block.

theWeaponMaster:LeviathanEject.NAME: [#808080]Eject [#808080]->
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanEject.DESCRIPTION: Eject all spent Leviathan cartridges and deal !D! damage X times to target enemy.
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanEject.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Eject all spent Leviathan cartridges and deal !D! damage X times to target enemy.

theWeaponMaster:LeviathanGroundSplitter.NAME: [#808080]Ground [#808080]Splitter
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanGroundSplitter.DESCRIPTION: Stagger all enemy cards depending on their total block for two turns.
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanGroundSplitter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Stagger all enemy cards depending on their total block for three turns.

theWeaponMaster:LW_Revenant.NAME: [#bf3a3b]Revenant [#bf3a3b]Cleaver
theWeaponMaster:LW_Revenant.DESCRIPTION: not_implemented - Equip the Revenant Cleaver and its corresponding cards.

theWeaponMaster:RevenantRavenousStrikes.NAME: [#bf3a3b]Ravenous [#bf3a3b]Strikes
theWeaponMaster:RevenantRavenousStrikes.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Deal !D! damage and heal for one third of the unblocked damage dealt. NL Gain !M! Vicious.

theWeaponMaster:RevenantBloodbath.NAME: [#bf3a3b]Bloodbath
theWeaponMaster:RevenantBloodbath.DESCRIPTION: Attack a random enemy for !D! damage. Use half your Berserk stacks to attack again until you run out.
theWeaponMaster:RevenantBloodbath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Attack a random enemy for !D! damage. Use half your Berserk stacks to attack again until you run out.

theWeaponMaster:LW_Abaddon.NAME: Abaddon
theWeaponMaster:LW_Abaddon.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL not_implemented - Deal !D! damage and drain Strength. NL Drain Dexterity if the opponent is casting a non-block skill.

theWeaponMaster:LW_Atlas.NAME: Atlas Blade
theWeaponMaster:LW_Atlas.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL not_implemented. NL Hit the opponent with !D! Ink damage.

theWeaponMaster:AtlasInkSlash.NAME: Ink Slash
theWeaponMaster:AtlasInkSlash.DESCRIPTION: Create an Ink Orb that blocks or deals damage with other Atlas Blade cards.

theWeaponMaster:AtroposSever.NAME: [#3abfbe]Severed [#3abfbe]Source
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSever.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL not_implemented - Deal !D! damage to your target and apply 1 Mana_Burn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL not_implemented - Deal !D! damage to your target and apply 1 Mana_Burn.
Legendary_Weapon NL not_implemented - Deal full Manablaze damage to your target and remove Manablaze.

theWeaponMaster:AtroposCard2.NAME: [#3abfbe]Split [#3abfbe]Scissors
theWeaponMaster:AtroposCard2.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice to target enemy. NL Deal !M! Extra damage for each Mana_Blaze stack.
theWeaponMaster:AtroposCard2.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice to target enemy. NL Deal !M! Extra damage for each Mana_Blaze stack.

theWeaponMaster:LW_Astra.NAME: The Astras
theWeaponMaster:LW_Astra.DESCRIPTION: not_implemented NL Summon the legendary Astras and gain their corresponding cards.

theWeaponMaster:AstraBrahmaastra.NAME: Brahmaastra
theWeaponMaster:AstraBrahmaastra.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL not_implemented - All enemies lose !D! HP. NL Gain 2 Vulnerable

theWeaponMaster:LW_Chronos.NAME: Chronophage
theWeaponMaster:LW_Chronos.DESCRIPTION: not_implemented NL Summon the Chronophage from across space and time and gain its corresponding cards.

theWeaponMaster:BullyIntimidate.NAME: Intimidate
theWeaponMaster:BullyIntimidate.DESCRIPTION: Expend !M! Vicious to force target enemy to defend.

theWeaponMaster:BullyTaunt.NAME: Taunt
theWeaponMaster:BullyTaunt.DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Apply 2 Vulnerable to an attacking enemy. NL Otherwise apply 2 weak and force the enemy to attack.
theWeaponMaster:BullyTaunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Apply 3 Weak to an attacking enemy. NL Otherwise apply 2 weak and force the enemy to attack.

theWeaponMaster:BullyWimp.NAME: Wimp
theWeaponMaster:BullyWimp.DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Apply !M! Weak to all enemies.

theWeaponMaster:BullyMeanToEveryone.NAME: Mean to everyone!
theWeaponMaster:BullyMeanToEveryone.DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Taunt all non-attacking enemies, they gain 2 Strength and you gain !M! Strength for every applied Taunt.

theWeaponMaster:BullyTerrifyingHowl.NAME: Terrifying Howl
theWeaponMaster:BullyTerrifyingHowl.DESCRIPTION: Force all attacking enemies to defend.
